projects.title: RAG Chatbot
projects.summary: Retrieval-augmented QA system over custom corpus with FastAPI backend and interactive frontend.
projects.description: A sophisticated chatbot that uses Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) to answer questions about custom documents. Built with Python FastAPI backend, OpenAI GPT integration, and Qdrant vector database for semantic search.

projects.title: JavaScript Exercise
projects.summary: Interactive DOM manipulation and array methods challenge with real-time feedback.
projects.description: A comprehensive JavaScript exercise demonstrating advanced DOM manipulation, array methods, and modern ES6+ features. Includes interactive examples and real-time code execution.

projects.title: Research Paper: AI Applications
projects.summary: Co-authored research paper on novel applications of artificial intelligence in web development.
projects.description: Academic research exploring the intersection of AI and modern web development practices, with focus on automated code generation and intelligent user interfaces.
